Check if outdated or non-existent file is.

Source: R/files-conflicts.R
solve_file_name_conflict.Rd

If quiet = FALSE (default) will give a hint of where the file is referenced.

Usage

solve_file_name_conflict(
  files,
  regex,
  dir = ".",
  extra_msg = NULL,
  quiet = FALSE,
  what = NULL,
  new_file = NULL
)

Arguments

files

which files to search in

regex

a regex related to the file name to search for

dir

A directory where to operate

extra_msg

Extra message to pass

quiet

A logical, informs where the occurrences are found. (Default, FALSE)

what

Which file conflicts we talking about

new_file

(Optional) new file name

Value

Mostly called for its side-effects, but will return the number of matches (0 if no referenced files are problematic)

On this page
